item.title: TakeHost first Ryzen 9 VPS trial in Germany
item.description: TakeHost.Biz just had its first VPS plan tested at VPSBenchmarks: DE 8GB RAM. All TakeHost.Biz plans run on AMD Ryzen 9 9950X and those plans currently go for 10â‚¬ for 4 cores and 8GB RAM (regular price 20â‚¬). Backups are included by default. TakeHost.Biz data center is in Germany and it is headquartered in Norway.

item.title: Next-Gen VPS Hosting at 0ping.eu
item.description: 0ping.eu is a European VPS provider that focuses on low-latency connectivity and modern infrastructure. The company aims to combine the latest-generation hardware with a strong, well-peered network to provide a balanced platform for a wide range of applications. Based in Frankfurt, one of Europeâ€™s best-connected hubs, 0ping.eu benefits from direct peering with many networks, which helps reduce round-trip times. Regular hardware refresh cycles are part of its operations, ensuring customers always run on up-to-date systems without unexpected service changes. 0ping.eu... (continued)

VPSÂ 2026 builds on KVM virtualization to provide isolated compute, RAM and NVMe storage resources with full root access. You can select from six configurations ranging from 4Â vCores/8Â GBÂ RAM/75Â GBÂ disk to 24Â vCores/96Â GBÂ RAM/400Â GBÂ NVMe. All plans include unlimited traffic with guaranteed bandwidth (from 400Â Mbps to 3Â Gbps) and daily backups. OVHcloud offers a choice of Linux, Windows and FreeBSD distributions and supports popular control panels like... (continued)

item.title: Cherry Servers launches new line of ARM based cloud servers
item.description: Cherry Servers released a new line of VDS based on dedicated AmpereONE A192-32X hardware ARM cores. The pricing is around 8â‚¬ per core and amount of RAM with each plan is very generous (6GB per core or more). The new VDS are available in Lithuania. Cloud ARM VDS.

item.title: New line of OVHcloud VPS
item.description: OVHcloud unveils a new line of VPS starting at 4.49â‚¬/mo with 4 cores and 8GB RAM. All VPS come with unlimited bandwidth and free standard daily backups. The new VPS line replaces both the old Intel VPS and AMD VLE lines of servers. Prices are listed at https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-ie/vps/.

item.title: BlastVPS: VPS with RDP and dedicated servers
item.description: BlastVPS, a young provider based in Belgium with locations in France, Germany and the US, was added to VPSBenchmarks a few days ago. Its first performance trial is now running on a 4 vCPUs 8GB server. BlastVPS offers Linux VPS and Windows VPS with RDP as well as dedicated servers and web hosting plans.

item.title: Hexabyte first performance trial
item.description: Hexabyte is a VPS, web hosting and dedicated servers provider operating out of Sweden and it was just added to VPSBenchmarks last week. Hexabyte first performance trial: 4 EPYC 7713 cores for 6.96â‚¬.

item.title: July 2025 Best VPS rankings are out
item.description: Evolution Host (Professional plan $60/mo) and Hostup (VPS XS $7.50/mo) took the lead last month: Best VPS July 2025.

item.title: UpCloud GPU servers available in Finland
item.description: UpCloud started offering GPU servers running on NVIDIA L40S GPUs in July. Configurations start at 1.111â‚¬/h with 1 GPU and 8 AMD EPYC 9575F vCPUs.

item.title: Kamatera Marketplace Expansion and New Hebrew Website Launch
item.description: Kamatera has 2 new offerings in its Marketplace, designed to give you more flexibility and control over your cloud infrastructure: New Marketplace applications KASM Workspaces: A containerized desktop solution that delivers full computing environments through your web browser. Users can access complete desktop experiences, development environments, and specialized applications without installing anything locally. Features include secure, isolated workspaces, browser-based access from any device, zero client-side software requirements, and perfect scalability for remote teams. item.title: Contabo Launches New VPS Lineup Based on User Feedback
item.description: Contabo, global cloud computing provider headquartered in Germany, has launched a new VPS lineup designed to deliver improved performance, stability, and value for money. The update follows extensive customer feedback and reflects the Contabo ongoing commitment to offering high-performance infrastructure solutions for competitive prices. The refreshed lineup introduces upgraded specifications across all plans, with prices starting from as little as $ 4.95/month (for VPS 10 with 3 vCPU cores and 8 GB RAM). item.title: New Enterprise and Global Best VPS rankings
item.description: VPSBenchmarks is launching two new Best VPS rankings: Best Enterprise VPS and Best Global VPS. Best Enterprise VPS â€“ This ranking will feature the fastest VPS over the past 12 months from providers that qualify as "Enterprise" providers. To be included, a provider must offer at least three of the following services: Block storage, Object storage, Load balancers, GPUs or Kubernetes. Additionally, hourly billing must be available for all products, and only cloud servers with hourly billing are included in... (continued)

item.title: Linkdata.com Permanently Lowers VPS Plans Prices by up to 50% in 2025
item.description:
Linkdata.com, a cloud provider with operations in London and Erbil, has announced a permanent price reduction of 30-50% across all Virtual Private Server (VPS) plans in 2025. This strategic move ensures businesses can access affordable, high-performance VPS solutions while maintaining the same level of reliability, performance, and expert support that clients have come to expect. item.title: Leaseweb Public Cloud and VPS are now available in Japan
item.description: Leaseweb Global, a leading cloud services and Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) provider, today announced the availability of its Public Cloud and Virtual Private Server (VPS) solutions in Japan. Delivered via local, in-country infrastructure, Leaseweb Public Cloud offers a highly competitive blend of cost-effective flexibility and global availability and is designed to be around 30% more cost effective than traditional hyperscalers while delivering the performance, reliability and service levels customers demand. The solution is ideally suited for any global organization... (continued)

item.title: Kamatera Adds Three New Apps to Marketplace
item.description: Kamatera is excited to announce the addition of three new applications to its marketplace: Chatwoot, TeamSpeak, and Harbor. Chatwoot brings advanced customer engagement capabilities to your business with its open-source customer communication platform. This tool enables teams to manage customer conversations across multiple channels like live chat, email, and more, all from a single dashboard, streamlining customer support operations. TeamSpeak joins the offerings as a popular voice and text communication platform, offering crystal-clear audio quality and robust security features. Perfect... (continued)

item.title: Introducing VPSB Intelligence
item.description: We're excited to announce VPSB Intelligence, a powerful new way to interact with VPSBenchmark's extensive database of Cloud providers, VPS plans specifications, pricing and performance data. This interface leverages LLMs and function calls to let you query our dataset using natural language, making it easier than ever to find precisely what you're looking for. Why VPSBenchmarks Intelligence? Finding the perfect VPS solution often requires analyzing multiple data points spread across different pages and sections of the website. While we've... (continued)
